text: The text is about a person (P1) who is missing their passport and is asking for help. They mention that they used their passport to pay for shoes in a shoe store and the store did not have it. The other person (P2) offers to help and suggests that the person should fill out a form for the loss of an object and keep a lookout for it. The person is also given a pen. The person then says they have the impression of losing something every time they travel.
